shortBio: Seasoned SAP Consultant with focus on UX. Helps global companies to get the best out of SAP software. My interest is not solely ABAP, I like to look accrosss the horizont to see what others are using and how this can be incorporated in a SAP solution.
longBio: I have a long background on several SAP topics. Learned SAP and ABAP in 1998 and since then focused on the intersection between SAP backend transactions and the user that works with them to bring benefits to the company. As the SAP customer is in the end the one that pays to use SAP, my focus is on helping customers to get the best out of SAP software. Be it with bringin the best UX to them, or by architecting timeless solutions that combine the best of several worlds. I lived in Brazil for 11 years and I learned there that SAP sells a global product, and that their programming tools are like a lingua franca for SAP professionals around the world.

Also active as a trainer and speaker at SAP community events and webinars for 8 years. Always interested in the latest stuff around ABAP and therefore in contact with OData, Fiori Elements and RAP since the beginning of time.

sessions.abstract: Wo geht die Reise hin? Was bleibt dabei zurück, was kommt, was ist wichtig? Was sind die kommenden Herausforderungen für ABAP Entwickler und Entwicklerinnen und wie kann man sich darauf vorbereiten?

shortBio: First and foremost I love wrting code. Since I wrote my first code on my Commodore C16 I have been obsessed with the idea of using software to solve problems. And I still really enjoy doing that.
longBio: I developed my first ABAP Report in 1990. At that time, it was in R/2 4.2. Much has changed over the years, but one thing stayed the same - I am still passionate about writing great SAP Applications and I like to share my knowledge. I am a co-founder of the SAP Inside Track Vienna #sitVIE and I also organize other community events like CodeRetreats, Stammtisch or Webinars in Vienna / Austria. I have two children, I like to play games on my original old game consoles and from time to time I partie in front of Rock Bands’ stages.

shortBio: Product Owner, Team Lead & Solution Architect
longBio: Product Owner, Team Lead & Solution Architect bei Universität Zürich | University of Zurich

sessions.title: Keynote: Modernizing a R/3 Solution with ABAP Cloud - Light and Shadow

shortBio: Software Engineer and Blogger for the latest ABAP Content.

sessions.title: ABAP Cloud - A life after the report
sessions.abstract:
Wie geht es weiter mit dem ALV und dem klassischen ABAP Report? In dieser Session beschäftigen wir uns mit der Migrationsstrategie in Richtung ABAP Cloud und welche Alternativen es mit RAP und dem Application Job gibt. In einem Beispiel gehen wir die einzelnen Schritte der Migration hin zu einer ABAP Cloud Anwendung durch.

What happens next with the ALV and the classic ABAP report? In this session we will look at the migration strategy towards ABAP Cloud and what alternatives there are with RAP and the Application Job. In an example we will go through the various steps of the migration to get an ABAP Cloud application.

shortBio: Ich bin seit 2015 als Berater und Entwickler in der Energieversorgerbranche unterwegs. Seit 2020 bin ich bei rku.it Mitglied der DevGarage. User Slogan ist 'ABAP ist cool!' und dieser Maxime folgend, suchen wir stets nach Möglichkeiten, unseren Horizont zu erweitern und Mehrwert für unsere Kunden, unsere Kollegen und uns selbst zu schaffen. Aktuell befinden uns in der laufenden Transformation von SAP IS-U zu SAP S/4HANA Utilities und werden Anfang 2025 mit unserem ersten Kunden produktiv gehen.
longBio: Ich bin seit 2015 als Berater und Entwickler in der Energieversorgerbranche unterwegs. Seit 2020 bin ich bei rku.it Mitglied der DevGarage. User Slogan ist 'ABAP ist cool!' und dieser Maxime folgend, suchen wir stets nach Möglichkeiten, unseren Horizont zu erweitern und Mehrwert für unsere Kunden, unsere Kollegen und uns selbst zu schaffen. Aktuell befinden uns in der laufenden Transformation von SAP IS-U zu SAP S/4HANA Utilities und werden Anfang 2025 mit unserem ersten Kunden produktiv gehen.

sessions.title: Releasemanagement mit gCTS
sessions.abstract:
Lifecycle und Release Management, sowie Versionsverwaltung gehören zu den wesentlichen Themen im Betrieb eines S/4HANA Systems. Mit gCTS bietet die SAP hier seit einigen Jahren ein Werkzeug, dass das Versionskontrollsystem git mit dem Transportwesen zusammenbringt.

In diesem Vortrag möchte ich ein paar Ansätze skizzieren, gCTS in Kombination mit einem Transportmanagementsystem zu nutzen, um ein ganzheitliches Releasemanagement für eine Systemlandschaft mit mehreren parallelen fünfstufigen Systemschienen aufzusetzen.

Folgende Themen habe ich dabei im Fokus:
-Kurze Übersicht über wesentliche Funktionen von gCTS
- Einsatz von gCTS und Transportmanagement in verschiedenen Systemlandschaften
- Zuschnitt von Repositories
- Regeln für die Nutzung von Branches
- Retrofit vom Wartungs- in das Entwicklungssystem
- Herausforderungen

company: Freelancer with SwissLife, ConVista, Brights Learning
shortBio: I am an SAP Software Engineer and Coach focused on software testing and clean code. I help teams build high-quality, maintainable solutions by implementing best practices and fostering a culture of continuous improvement in software development.
longBio: I am an experienced SAP Software Engineer and Coach specializing in software testing and clean code practices. With a deep commitment to quality and efficiency, I help teams and organizations implement best practices in software development, ensuring robust, maintainable, and scalable solutions. Known for my practical approach and passion for continuous improvement, I empower developers to elevate their skills and embrace a culture of excellence in coding and testing.

sessions.title: Unit Test your Business Objects in RAP
sessions.abstract:
A session on unit testing business objects in RAP covers the fundamental principles and practices of testing business logic within the RAP framework. Participants will learn how to design and implement unit tests for RAP business objects using the ABAP Test Double Framework. The session will focus on creating test scenarios to validate business rules, data consistency, and transactional behaviors without relying on a database connection or external dependencies. Key topics include setting up the test environment, creating mock objects, simulating data retrieval and modification, and executing tests to ensure the robustness and reliability of business logic in a RAP application. This hands-on session aims to equip developers with the skills to confidently test and maintain high-quality RAP applications.

Based on the GitHub Repo from Christian Drumm (https://github.com/ceedee666/modern-abap-curriculum) the participants can follow the session as a hands-on exercise

shortBio: Marc is the founder of apm.to, an innovative and highly specialized start-up company on a mission to build the world’s best ABAP open source tools for SAP customers, partners, and developers.
longBio: Marc is the founder of Marc Bernard Tools, an innovative and highly specialized start-up company on a mission to build the world’s best open source tools for SAP Basis, SAP Business Warehouse, and SAP BW/4HANA customers, partners, and developers

sessions.title: apm - From Vision to Reality
sessions.abstract:
In the world of ABAP development, the lack of efficient code sharing, robust version control, and automated dependency management have long been barriers to innovation and productivity. As developers increasingly seek open-source solutions, apm emerges as a transformative package manager designed to address these challenges, drawing inspiration from successful ecosystem solutions like npm.

Explore how apm seamlessly integrates into your technology discovery routine, making it an essential part of your developer toolkit. Join us to uncover apm's straightforward approach to versioning, dependency management, and manifest definitions.

Experience apm firsthand in our free and unlimited playground, where you can publish, download, and install packages with ease. Quickly activate your apm account and transition from adoption to becoming a proficient 'badass user.'

Finally, discover how to join a vibrant community of ABAP developers dedicated to ongoing engagement and collaborative problem-solving. Be part of the revolution transforming ABAP development through open-source innovation.

shortBio: CEO Softway AG | We love Formulare | Clean ABAP | Be agile
longBio:
Ich habe großen Spaß daran neue Sachen auszuprobieren, daraus zu lernen und dadurch mich selbst und andere weiterzuentwickeln.
Meine Mission ist es unsere Kunden für unsere Produkte und Dienstleistungen im SAP-Umfeld zu begeistern.

sessions.title: Von SAPscript zu Adobe Forms - Freud und Leid in der Formularentwicklung

shortBio: Co-Founder and CEO of educatedBytes GmbH, software architect, ABAP developer, SAP Champion, blogger, lecturer, father, husband, son ... always in service
longBio: I’ve been working as an ABAP developer in energy supply logistics for many years, mainly on legacy code. In addition, I teach at a local university of applied sciences, write blogs and articles in and for the SAP community and for heise developer. I’m also the co-founder of educatedBytes GmbH

sessions.title: Von SAPscript zu Adobe Forms - Freud und Leid in der Formularentwicklung

shortBio: Innovationsmanager und SAP Stammtisch Organisator
longBio: Seit 1996 im SAP Umfeld und vor allem im ABAP tätig. Über die Jahr in verschiedenen Rollen unterwegs. In der letzten Zeit beschäftige ich mich vorrangig mit hybriden Landschaften, Systemintegration, Datascience und KI. Opensource Fan. SAP Stammtisch Magdeburg Organisator.

sessions.title: ABAP Hybrid - Magie mit Graph Datenmodellen
sessions.abstract:
Wenn wir über die Grenzen eines ABAP Stacks hinaus denken (können), dann ist so manche komplexe Herausforderung unseres ABAP Alltags einfacher lösbar und sorgt zusätzlich für clean core. Mit Graph Datenmodellen bekommen wir neue 'Dimensionen' in denen wir uns bewegen können. Im Rahmen meines Vortrags stelle ich einige unserer Szenarien und Lösungsansätze vor.

ABAP Hybrid heißt nicht zwangsweise Cloud, was ich bei meinem letzten ABAPConf Vortrag schon thematisiert habe. KI wird auch wieder eingebaut: Graph Datenmodelle sind eine gute Basis für GraphRAG's...

shortBio: SAP Technical Expert | 10+ years of experience | India-based | Passionate about exploring the intersection of technology and society | Enthusiastic about deep conversations on innovation and its impact
longBio: SAP Technical Expert with 10+ years of experience, driving innovation in the SAP ecosystem. Passionate about technology's impact on society and sharing knowledge with others. Outside work, I enjoy playing with my son, analyzing movies, playing cricket, traveling, love beers. I believe in the power of deep conversations to spark new ideas and drive meaningful change.

sessions.title: Streamlining ABAP Code reviews with AI: ABAP GenAI Co-pilot on Microsoft Teams for S/4HANA on-premise
sessions.abstract: This session explores how the ABAP GenAI Co-Pilot, powered by SAP Generative AI Hub helps in the code review activities like code analysis, defect detection, integrate microsoft teams for collaboration etc. for development leads & managers. Presentation as well as demo will be shown for this session.

shortBio: ABAP/NodeJs developer and active contributor to the SAP Open Source Community
longBio:
ABAP/NodeJS Developer with a passion for innovation and modernization.
Joined Regesta Italia S.p.A, SAP Gold Partner, in 2019 and began my journey in ABAP development.
Since 2023, owner and maintainer of the open-source project TRM (Transport Request Manager).

sessions.title: Making an on-premise ABAP CI/CD with GitHub Actions
sessions.abstract: Live demo of my blog article 'Making an OnPremise ABAP CI/CD with Github Actions': how to leverage community-driven, open-source solutions to create a modern CI/CD setup for ABAP. This demo will showcase tools like abapGit, abapLint, ADASH, and TRM, demonstrating how each contributes to the pipeline. The demo will also include a brief overview of Git branching strategies tailored for effective CI/CD implementation.

function: Strategic Enterprise Architect for SAP & SAP Mentor
shortBio: Mr. Eijpe is an SAP strategic enterprise architect, ABAP cloud developer, and user experience consultant. He is also an SAP Mentor, frequently speaking and writing about innovative SAP solutions.
longBio:
Robert Eijpe, a graduate of the Eindhoven University of Technology in 1995, began his SAP journey in 1996 as an SAP development engineer. His career has been a rich tapestry of roles and projects for major companies such as Deloitte Consulting, Philips Medical, Unilever, RWE, Leiden University, SAP SE, Blackline Inc., and Booking. As the co-founder and general manager of NL for Business, an SAP consultancy company established in the Netherlands in 2001, he has been instrumental in the company's focus on SAP custom-build innovations, including Integration, User Experience, Cloud Development, and Design Thinking.

Mr. Eijpe is an SAP strategic enterprise architect, ABAP cloud developer, and user experience consultant. He is also an SAP Mentor, frequently speaking and writing about innovative SAP solutions. His specialties include design thinking, business process management, enterprise architecture for SAP, user experience, and custom build development. He is a strategic advisor for integration and custom-build developments on S/4HANA and SAP BTP.

sessions.title: Lessons learned building a product on clean core ABAP on S/4HANA public cloud
sessions.abstract: In this session, we will share the challenges and lessons we learned when we built the partner solution FEXS API Connect for the S/4HANA public cloud with Clean Core ABAP. We will first explain the possible integration options for integrating as a partner with the S/4HANA public cloud and why we chose to build it on an embedded ABAP cloud environment. We will discuss the challenges we face with using an S/4HANA public cloud environment and how we overcome the restrictions of cloud ABAP and the RAP model. We will talk more about using RAP events, bgPF, XCO libraries, and other capabilities of the ABAP cloud, which will help us realize our solution.

function: Senior SAP Technical Consultant | SAP Developer (ABAP, RAP & Fiori) | Technical Team Lead | Trainer
shortBio: I am an experienced consultant committed to delivering high-quality SAP projects. I specialize in ABAP Cloud development with RAP and Clean Core principles.
longBio:
I am an experienced consultant committed to delivering high-quality SAP projects. I am passionate about technology and dedicated to continuous learning. Starting as an ABAP developer, I specialize in ABAP Cloud development with RAP and Clean Core principles. I have advanced my expertise in S/4HANA on-premise and cloud environments. Recently, I have focused on integrations between S/4HANA and other systems.

My experience includes solution design, custom development architecture, and technical team leadership. I have also served as a mentor and people manager. I prioritize building solutions that address real needs through careful requirement gathering and fair customer expectation management.

sessions.title: Lessons learned building a product on clean core ABAP on S/4HANA public cloud
sessions.abstract: In this session, we will share the challenges and lessons we learned when we built the partner solution FEXS API Connect for the S/4HANA public cloud with Clean Core ABAP. We will first explain the possible integration options for integrating as a partner with the S/4HANA public cloud and why we chose to build it on an embedded ABAP cloud environment. We will discuss the challenges we face with using an S/4HANA public cloud environment and how we overcome the restrictions of cloud ABAP and the RAP model. We will talk more about using RAP events, bgPF, XCO libraries, and other capabilities of the ABAP cloud, which will help us realize our solution.

shortBio: Senior Technical Evangelist & Product Manager
longBio: I'm a multi-passionate woman who thrives in international and forward thinking environments. I dedicate my time to two things: my IT product manager/evangelist job at dox42 and supporting women and students through financial education and coaching. That's my unique combination & I love it

sessions.title: Dokumentengenerierung mit dox42 in ABAP RAP

shortBio: Fiori Enthusiast
longBio:
Ich bin Dušan [:duschan:]. SAP Developer aus Tschechien, wohne und arbeite bei Cadaxo in Wien seit 2015.

Ich bin der Mr. Web aus unserem Cadaxo Team. Am liebsten arbeite ich am Frontend und bringe verschiedene Design Ideen aus Papier und Kopf in den Browser hinein.

sessions.title: Verloren im CDS Dschungel?
sessions.abstract:
Wie eine grafische Visualisierung die Sicht auf CDS Views, ihre Annotationen und Abhängigkeiten verändern kann.

Habt ihr euch schon mal gefragt, in welchen CDS Views eine Tabelle denn jetzt genau verwendet wird? Wie diese von einander abhängen? Oder wo in einer CDS Hierarchie ein Feld nun verwendet wird, und wo nicht mehr? Oder auf welcher Ebene gewisse Annotations gesetzt werden? Oder…?

Wir nehmen euch mit auf die Reise, wir wir uns selbst in dem Dschungel verirrt haben, dann in den verschiedenen Lockdowns mit graphischen Darstellung experimentiert haben um dann ein Tool zu schaffen, dass wir jetzt demnächst auf Github Allen zur Verfügung stellen.

shortBio: SAP Enthusiast
longBio: 1998 die ersten Berührungen mit SAP gemacht. (4.5b), seitdem dem SAP Virus verfallen. nach vielen Jahren bei der SAP in der Beratung, 2009 die Cadaxo mit gegründet und seitdem immer auf der Suche nach den besten neuen SAP Technologien.

sessions.title: Verloren im CDS Dschungel?
sessions.abstract:
Wie eine grafische Visualisierung die Sicht auf CDS Views, ihre Annotationen und Abhängigkeiten verändern kann.

Wir nehmen euch mit auf die Reise, wir wir uns selbst in dem Dschungel verirrt haben, dann in den verschiedenen Lockdowns mit graphischen Darstellung experimentiert haben um dann ein Tool zu schaffen, dass wir jetzt demnächst auf Github Allen zur Verfügung stellen.

In more recent years, Ivan has been a regular speaker at SAP events, evangelizing SAP security.
longBio: Ivan Mans is a seasoned SAP technology consultant, working in the SAP space since 1997, the early days of R/3. In 2012 Ivan co-founded SecurityBridge and in his current role as CTO he is a motivated driver, inspires people and pushes technology, contributing to the continuous innovation of the SecurityBridge Platform. sessions.title: Secure custom SAP development - Typical security issues in ABAP code

shortBio: ABAP Dinosaurier seit 1994, Tricktresor, Badminton, Hunde
longBio: ABAP Programmer since 1994. Evolved from SAP-Script to Clean Code in just 30 years. ABAP Enthusiast. Sharing is caring.  Love and Peace.

sessions.title: Programming Glitches and ABAP Hacks
sessions.abstract: SAP will nicht, dass du dies weißt: Ich zeige einige Merkwürdigkeiten aus drei Jahrzehnten ABAP-Programmierung. Ich zeige Dinge auf, die möglich sind, aber vielleicht lieber nicht gemacht werden sollten. Leider könnte das unter 'outdated techniques' fallen, die ja explizit nicht gewünscht sind.

shortBio: Thomas Schneider is area product owner for extensibility
longBio: Thomas Schneider is area product owner for extensibility. He is a chief development architect in the BTP ABAP organization.

sessions.title: Key User and Developer Extensibility Options - Best practices
sessions.abstract:
Key User Extensibility is a major pillar of the SAP S/4HANA Extensibility concept. It enables business experts to do last mile extensions by their own. But it also provides a lot of value for developers.

Developer Extensibility on the other hand empowers the developer to develop extensions in a clean core compliant way using the ABAP Cloud development model.

In this session, we provide an overview on these extensibility options and will provide best practices when to use what. We provide examples for extensions that are realized as combination of key user and developer extensibility.

sessions.title: Key User and Developer Extensibility Options - Best practices
sessions.abstract:
Key User Extensibility is a major pillar of the SAP S/4HANA Extensibility concept. It enables business experts to do last mile extensions by their own. But it also provides a lot of value for developers.

Developer Extensibility on the other hand empowers the developer to develop extensions in a clean core compliant way using the ABAP Cloud development model.

In this session, we provide an overview on these extensibility options and will provide best practices when to use what. We provide examples for extensions that are realized as combination of key user and developer extensibility.

sessions.title: Implementing Extension Fields using Key User and Developer Extensibility - Do's and Don'ts
sessions.abstract:
In this session we will focus on how to implement extensions using extension fields.

We will demonstrate both the key user tools and the developer extensibility wizard in ADT to implement typical scenarios using extension fields. We will provide guidance for the Do’s and Don’ts in the extensibility area.

longBio: Daniel Wachs is a development architect at SAP for extensibility

shortBio: 12+ years of experience with SAP Developments. Programming topics: S/4HANA, ABAP Restful Programming Model(RAP), ABAP on HANA, ABAP, Fiori, OData, CDS, AMDP's, BOPF, SAP BTP- ABAP Environment
longBio:
12+ years of experience with SAP Developments.  Currently working as a Senior Developer with Order to Cash team at Booking Holdings.

Worked on products like CRM, HCM, S/4HANA Employee Integration, Success Factors Employee Central to ERP Integration, ERP to Success Factors Employee Central Migration, S/4HANA Intelligent Real Estate.

Worked as Scrum Master, S/4HANA RAP Trainer with SAP Development Learning at SAP.

Specialties: Product Development, Scrum Master with strong experience in Agile and Scrum based software development, Facilitating Training Sessions , Training Delivery, Creating Content for courses for Programming topics: S/4HANA, ABAP Restful Programming Model(RAP), ABAP on HANA, ABAP, Fiori, OData, CDS, AMDP's, BOPF, SAP BTP- ABAP Environment.

sessions.title: Enable OData Streams in RAP
sessions.abstract:
How to enable OData Streams such as excel, pdf, Images and other large objects using standard RAP Based application development without using UI5 tooling?

With the latest SAP BTP ABAP Environment 2208 release the RAP framework now supports OData streams. It is now possible to enable your RAP application to maintain and handle Large Objects(LOBs).This feature provides end users an option to upload external files of different file formats such as PDF, XLSX , binary file format and other types hence allowing media handling.

shortBio: 8+ years of experience with SAP Developments. Programming topics: S/4HANA, ABAP Restful Programming Model(RAP), ABAP on HANA, ABAP, Fiori, OData, CDS, AMDP's, BOPF, SAP BTP- ABAP Environment
longBio: Currently working as SAP specialist with Booking holdings. Worked as Senior ABAP developer with Standard Chartered Bank GBS. Ex-development consultant with SAP. Skilled in SAP ABAP programming language,S4 HANA conversion and implementation and automation techniques and all other SAP technologies namely reports,enhancements,interfaces,S4 HANA conversion and implementation and new technologies like RAP, Fiori etc. Extensively worked on S4 HANA conversion and automation tool and SAP TM

shortBio: Volker Drees works as a Product Expert for the ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model in the Technology & Innovation, BTP ABAP.
longBio: Volker Drees works as a Product Expert for the ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model in the Technology & Innovation, BTP ABAP.

sessions.title: Clean Core extensibility with ABAP Cloud in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition
sessions.abstract:
ABAP Cloud is the powerful development model for clean core compliant, cloud-ready business applications, services, and extensions.

In this session, we will demonstrate how the 3-tier extensibility model helps you to consume BAPIs with ABAP Cloud in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition and SAP S/4HANA.

shortBio: Product Lead ABAP Cloud Programming Model (RAP), Development Expert, Enthusiast@SAP
longBio: Together with implementation teams of SAP BTP ABAP, we are shaping the design of the ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model (RAP).

sessions.abstract:
ABAP Cloud is the powerful development model for clean core compliant, cloud-ready business applications, services, and extensions.

In this session, we will demonstrate how the 3-tier extensibility model helps you to consume BAPIs with ABAP Cloud in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition and SAP S/4HANA.

function: Product Owner of ABAP development tools
shortBio: Thomas has more than 20 years experience in ABAP development tools and is the product owner of the new ABAP Development Tools in Eclipse.
longBio: I have more than 20 years experience in ABAP development. I'm the product owner of the ABAP development tools. Special focus for me is the area of tools around custom code management like the ATC, the SQLM and the usage analysis tools. I'm also presenter on SAP TechEds and SAP Inside Tracks. You can also follow me on Twitter via @thfiedler

sessions.title: ABAP Test Cockpit (ATC) goes Cloud - ATC on SAP BTP
sessions.abstract: ABAP Test Cockpit (ATC) on SAP BTP is now ready for use and recommended by SAP for Clean Core governance and static quality assurance of your SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud (or on-premise) development landscapes. ATC on SAP BTP offers such essential capabilities like code analysis, custom checks, baseline, developer scenario, robust exemptions workflow or scheduling of ATC runs. The SAP Code Vulnerability Analyzer (CVA) security checks are included into ATC on SAP BTP at no additional licensing fee. Join this session to learn about ATC on BTP and see it in action.

shortBio: SAP Product Manager with over 15 years of product management experience in various ABAP Platform topics like ABAP development, testing and troubleshooting tools, connectivity, and overall ABAP Platform rollout activities. As a product manager Olga is a regular speaker at SAP TechEd and SAP User Groups and partner events, as well as individual customer & partner workshops. Furthermore Olga drives product management for custom code migration tools for SAP S/4HANA and ABAP Cloud.

sessions.title: Integration Troubleshooting in the SAP BTP, ABAP Environment
sessions.abstract:
This session will offer an overview of troubleshooting capabilities within the Business Technology Platform (BTP) ABAP environment, specifically focusing on integration aspects.

You will see how to troubleshoot integration scenarios and discover different tools necessary for effectively addressing integration and security issues.

sessions.title: Closing Keynote: The Modern SAP Full-Stack Developer
